# Table

A _table_ component is use to display a tableau data

## Basic Use

_table_ markup

- `.table`

<snippeter>
<pre>
<table class="table">
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>#</th>
      <th>First Name</th>
      <th>Last name</th>
      <th>Address</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>1</td>
      <td>Ahmed</td>
      <td>Gutierrez</td>
      <td>New land</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>2</td>
      <td>Ismail </td>
      <td>Gutierrez</td>
      <td>9K poplar dr</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>3</td>
      <td>Hazem </td>
      <td>Fox</td>
      <td>444 harrison </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>4</td>
      <td>Ave</td>
      <td>Martin</td>
      <td>auerbach ave</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
</pre>
</snippeter>
